/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a two-lane road stretching into the distance, flanked by lush green fields on either side. The road, a ribbon of gray, is devoid of any vehicles, adding to the tranquility of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the entire landscape. The perspective of the image is from a low angle, looking down the road towards the horizon, giving a sense of depth and distance. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the fields contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
